name: Smoochum
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: It tests everything by touching with its lips, which remember what it likes and dislikes.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Jynx from your hand onto Smoochum (this counts as evolving Smoochum) and remove all damage counters from Smoochum.

attacks.name: Psykiss
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon and have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.
